overview: Live Kreation: Revisioned Glory is a DVD by German thrash metal band Kreator that was released on June 24, 2003. It was also released as a limited edition boxset that included the DVD, the double live album Live Kreation, an exclusive 36 page deluxe colour booklet and a full colour poster. The DVD is mixed in 5.1 Digital Surround Sound
title: Kreator: Live Kreation - Revisioned Glory
